about.memberDesc: Role / Fun Fact / Quote goes here...

sports.title: Live Sports & Atmosphere
sports.intro: Whether your team just scored a last-minute try, conceded a heartbreaking goal, or you're just here because the game's on and the craic is good — O'Brians is your spot. Come for the match, stay for the atmosphere, and leave with a celebratory pint, a consolation cocktail… or honestly, just any drink that feels right. We're not fussy.

rugby.title: Rugby – Six Nations & Local Pride
rugby.text: Rugby runs deep here. During the Six Nations, Scots, Welsh, Italians, Irish, French — everyone’s welcome (even if the banter gets lively). And when Racing Narbonne is playing? We’re all in! Big screens, great sound, and zero judgment if you’re supporting the ‘other’ side.

football.title: Football
football.text: Football fans, we’ve got you too. Ligue 1, Premier League, Champions League, international friendlies — if it’s worth watching, we’ll show it. Rising in the table or fighting relegation, we’ll be here for every high and low. Bring your mates, your scarves, your superstitions — we’ll supply the volume and the vibes, and of course the screen and drinks.

otherSports.text: Of course, we’re not just about team ball games. Tennis Grand Slams, MotoGP, Formula 1, boxing, whatever’s got the world talking — if there’s a crowd that wants to watch, we’ll make space.
otherSports.bookText: Want to make sure your event is on? Fancy reserving a table or a corner for your crew? Drop us an email a day or two before — we’ll sort the screens, the sound, and the best seats in the house.

cta.emailButton: Email us about an upcoming match
cta.instaText: Follow us on Instagram @obrians_pub_narbonne for last-minute updates on what’s showing

footer.address: 9 Bd Général de Gaulle, 11100 Narbonne, France
